code: import React from"react";import'./VideoPlayer.scss';import play from'../../assets/icons/play.svg';import volume from'../../assets/icons/volume_up.svg';import fullscreen from'../../assets/icons/fullscreen.svg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function VideoPlayer(_ref){let{videoLink}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"video-player",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"video-player__section-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("video",{className:"video-player__video",poster:videoLink}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"video-player__controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"video-player__play",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:play,alt:"Video play icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"video-player__scrub",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"video-player__scrub-bar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"video-player__scrub-time",children:"0:00 / 0:42"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"video-player__right-control",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:fullscreen,alt:"Fullscreen icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:volume,alt:"Volume icon"})]})]})]})});}export default VideoPlayer;
